page.title: 03THE PARISH CHURCH, MILVERTON
page.content:
WE TALKED TO THE VICAR ABOUT HIMSELF AND HIS JOB. PEOPLE USE THE CHURCH A LOT. THERE HAVE ALREADY BEEN 7 CHRISTENINGS THIS YEAR. THERE ARE USUALLY 2 FUNERALS A MONTH, THOUGH THERE ARE NORMALLY MORE FUNERALS IN THE WINTER MONTHS. THIS YEAR THERE HAVE BEEN 5 WEDDINGS IN THE CHURCH.
THE VICAR TOLD US HE ENJOYED HIS JOB A LOT, ESPECIALLY VISITING PEOPLE AND GETTING TO KNOW THE PEOPLE IN THE PARISH. THE VICAR ENJOYS TAKING HOLY COMMUNION BECAUSE IT IS THE CHURCH'S MOST IMPORTANT SERVICE.
WHEN THE VICAR IS NOT TAKING A SERVICE HE WRITES HIS SERMON AND ARTICLES FOR THE PARISH MAGAZINE. HIS LAST JOB WAS IN LIVERPOOL, WHICH WAS VERY DIFFERENT FROM MILVERTON.
